title: Nytårstorsk - bagt torsk med sennepssauce

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient 'smør' (butter) is best matched with 'smør, saltet' (salted butter) because it is the most direct and least processed form of butter available in the database. While 'jordnøddesmør' (peanut butter) and 'smørbart blandingsprodukt, 75% fedt' (75% fat spreadable blend product) are also spreads, they are not butter and have different compositions and production processes, making 'smør, saltet' the most realistic and appropriate match for CO2 emissions.

The ingredient 'rødbeder' (beetroots) is best matched with 'rødbede' (beetroot) because it is the most direct and least processed form of beetroot available. 'Rødbede, konserves' (canned beetroot) is a processed version, and 'rødkål' (red cabbage) and 'rødløg' (red onion) are different vegetables entirely, making 'rødbede' the most appropriate and realistic match for CO2 emissions.

The ingredient 'mørk balsamicoeddike' (dark balsamic vinegar) is best matched with 'eddike' (vinegar). While 'rødvin' (red wine) is a base for some vinegars, 'eddike' is a direct and broader category that encompasses balsamic vinegar. 'Chokolade, mørk' (dark chocolate) and 'mørksej' (pollock) are entirely different food items and are not suitable matches. Therefore, 'eddike' is the most appropriate and realistic match for CO2 emissions.

The ingredient 'sukker' (sugar) is best matched with 'sukker, stødt melis (saccharose)' (granulated sugar (sucrose)). This is the most common and least processed form of sugar available in the database. 'Sukker, brun farin' (brown sugar) is a specific type of sugar, while 'sukkerært (mangetout)' (sugar snap pea) and 'honning' (honey) are entirely different food items, making 'sukker, stødt melis (saccharose)' the most appropriate and realistic match for CO2 emissions.

The ingredient 'torskeloin' (cod loin) is best matched with 'torsk, filet' (cod fillet). Both refer to cuts of cod fish. 'Torskelever' (cod liver) and 'torskelever, røget' (smoked cod liver) are specific parts of the cod and a processed version, respectively. 'Hornfisk' (garfish) is a different type of fish. Therefore, 'torsk, filet' is the most appropriate and realistic match for CO2 emissions.

The ingredient 'smør' (butter) is best matched with 'smør, saltet' (salted butter) because it is the most direct and least processed form of butter available in the database. While 'jordnøddesmør' (peanut butter) and 'smørbart blandingsprodukt, 75% fedt' (75% fat spreadable blend product) are also spreads, they are not butter and have different compositions and production processes, making 'smør, saltet' the most realistic and appropriate match for CO2 emissions.

The ingredient 'hvedemel' (wheat flour) is best matched with 'hvedemel, grahamsmel, fuldkorn' (wheat flour, graham flour, whole grain). This is the most direct and common form of wheat flour available in the database. 'Majsmel' (corn flour) is a different type of flour, and 'hvedekerner, hele/knækkede' (whole/cracked wheat kernels) are not flour. 'Mandeldrik, ikke beriget' (unfortified almond drink) is entirely unrelated. Therefore, 'hvedemel, grahamsmel, fuldkorn' is the most appropriate and realistic match for CO2 emissions.

The ingredient 'vand' (water) is best matched with 'vand, postevand' (water, tap water). This is the most direct and common form of water. 'Vandmelon' (watermelon) is a fruit, and 'tun i vand, konserves' (canned tuna in water) and 'sild' (herring) are fish products, making 'vand, postevand' the only appropriate and realistic match for CO2 emissions.

The ingredient 'hele gule sennepsfrø' (whole yellow mustard seeds) is best matched with 'sennep, gul, færdiglavet' (mustard, yellow, ready-made). While the ingredient specifies 'seeds', the closest available option is prepared yellow mustard, which is derived from mustard seeds. 'Solsikkefrø, afskallede, tørrede' (shelled, dried sunflower seeds) and 'sesamfrø, afskallede' (shelled sesame seeds) are different types of seeds. 'Solsikkeolie' (sunflower oil) is an oil, not a seed. Given the options, 'sennep, gul, færdiglavet' is the most realistic and appropriate match, as it represents the product derived from mustard seeds.

The ingredient 'finthakkede skalotteløg' (finely chopped shallots) is best matched with 'rødløg' (red onion). Shallots are a type of onion, and red onion is the closest available onion variety in the database. 'Løg, hakkede, dybfrost' (chopped onions, frozen) is a processed form of onion, and 'forårsløg' (spring onion) and 'spidskål' (pointed cabbage) are different vegetables. Given the options, 'rødløg' is the most appropriate and realistic match for CO2 emissions.

The ingredient 'koldt smør' (cold butter) is best matched with 'smør, saltet' (salted butter) because it is the most direct and least processed form of butter available in the database. The term 'koldt' (cold) refers to a state, not a processing method. 'Smørbart blandingsprodukt, 75% fedt' (75% fat spreadable blend product) and 'jordnøddesmør' (peanut butter) are not butter, and 'koldskål' (buttermilk dessert) is a finished product. Therefore, 'smør, saltet' is the most appropriate and realistic match for CO2 emissions.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: Mængden af friskkværnet peber er ikke angivet. LLM-estimat er: 1 portion = 0.005 kg, 1 * 0.005 kg = 0.005 kg
Mængden af friske krydderurter er ikke angivet. LLM-estimat er: 1 portion = 0.025 kg, 1 * 0.025 kg = 0.025 kg

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient 'friske krydderurter' (fresh herbs) is best matched with 'basilikum, frisk' (basil, fresh). This is a direct match for a fresh herb. 'Basilikum, tørret' (dried basil) is a processed version. 'Fyldt frisk pasta' (fresh filled pasta) is a different food category entirely. 'Persille' (parsley) is also a fresh herb, but 'basilikum, frisk' has a slightly lower CO2 emission factor, and both are equally valid as a general 'fresh herb' category. Therefore, 'basilikum, frisk' is chosen as the most appropriate and realistic match for CO2 emissions.

The ingredient 'stegte bacontern' (fried bacon cubes) is best matched with 'grisekød, bacon, stegestykke' (pork, bacon, fried piece). This is the most direct and realistic match for bacon, considering it is a pork product. 'Vegansk bacon' (vegan bacon) is a plant-based alternative and not a direct match. 'Grisekød, flæskesteg, nakkekam med svær' (pork, roast pork, neck with rind) is a different cut of pork, and 'oksekød, spegepølse' (beef, salami) is a different type of meat and processed product. Therefore, 'grisekød, bacon, stegestykke' is the most appropriate and realistic match for CO2 emissions.

weight_estimate.weight_calculation: Ingrediens ikke fundet i generelle vægte. LLM-estimat er: 1 vagtelæg = 10 g, 4 * 10 g = 40 g = 0.04 kg.

co2_per_kg_db.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient 'blødkogte vagtelæg' (soft-boiled quail eggs) is best matched with 'æg, skrabeæg' (eggs, free-range eggs). While 'vagtelæg' are specific, 'æg' (eggs) is the broader category that encompasses them. The term 'blødkogte' (soft-boiled) refers to a preparation method, not a processing method that changes the CO2 emissions. 'Æggesalat' (egg salad) is a prepared dish, 'nudler, æg' (noodles, egg) are a different food product, and 'kaviar, lodderogn' (caviar, capelin roe) is fish roe, not eggs. Therefore, 'æg, skrabeæg' is the most appropriate and realistic match for CO2 emissions.

instructions:
Marinerede rødbeder:
Smelt smørret i en gryde ved kraftig varme, men uden at det bruner. Svits rødbederne i ca. 2 min.
Tilsæt eddike, sukker og salt og kog dem ved kraftig varme og uden låg i ca. 5 min.
Kom rødbederne i en ovnfast skål og lad dem trække i ca. 2 timer og smag til.

Torsk:
Del torsken i fire lige store stykker. Læg stykkerne i et smurt ovnfast fad.
Pensl torskeskiverne med smør og drys med salt.
Bag fisken midt i ovnen i ca. 12 min. ved 200° - traditionel ovn.
Lun rødbederne på en rist nederst i ovnen de sidste 5 min. – hæld evt. lidt af væden fra rødbederne ved serveringen.

Sennepssauce:
Pisk mel og lidt af vandet sammen i en gryde.
Tilsæt resten af vandet, sennepsfrø og løg. Kog blandingen ved svag varme og under låg i ca. 10 min.
Tag gryden af varmen og pisk det kolde smør i lidt efter lidt.
Varm saucen op (den må ikke koge) og tilsæt salt og peber. Smag til.

Sådan anretter du Nytårstorsk:
Anret først rødbeder på fire tallerkner, kom torsken herpå, pynt med bacon, vagtelæg, krydderurter og server med sauce ved siden af.
